root.name: Star Trek: Secret of Vulcan Fury
root.description: The game was to feature pre-rendered computer generated versions of the original cast and crew of Star Trek. A large amount of assets were produced and screenshots were printed in magazines and other outlets. The game was to follow a format similar to watching episodes of the show, with its plot centering around the Vulcan-Romulan racial relationship. It was eventually cancelled and is probably one of the most legendary cancelled video games.
